biotools.summary: Compute various physical and chemical parameters for a given protein sequence. The computed parameters include the molecular weight, theoretical pI (isoelectric point), amino acid composition, atomic composition, extinction coefficient, estimated half-life, instability index, aliphatic index and grand average of hydropathicity (GRAVY).

bioschemas.name: ProtParam
bioschemas.summary: Compute various physical and chemical parameters for a given protein sequence. The computed parameters include the molecular weight, theoretical pI (isoelectric point), amino acid composition, atomic composition, extinction coefficient, estimated half-life, instability index, aliphatic index and grand average of hydropathicity (GRAVY).
